column2: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Video Producer to lead our video    production efforts.      As a Video Producer, you will be responsible for the entire    lifecycle of video projects, from concept development to final delivery, ensuring the    highest quality and creative execution.          Key Responsibilities:            Conceptualize, plan, and oversee the production of video content for various    purposes, including marketing, promotional, instructional, and storytelling    videos.        Lead the entire video production process, from pre-production (scripting,    storyboarding, budgeting, and scheduling) to post-production (editing, sound    design, and final delivery).        Collaborate with the creative team to develop creative concepts and scripts    for video projects.        Manage and coordinate all aspects of video shoots, including hiring crew    members, securing locations, and acquiring necessary equipment.        Direct and supervise on-set activities to ensure the quality and adherence to    the creative vision.        Oversee post-production, including editing, visual effects, sound design, and    color correction.        Manage and maintain video archives and backups.        Stay up-to-date with industry trends, video technology, and creative    techniques.        Budget video projects and ensure they are delivered on time and within    budget.        Ensure all video content is optimized for various platforms and devices.        Continuously improve production and post-production processes to enhance    the quality of video content.          Qualifications:          Bachelors degree in Film, Video Production, or a related field (or equivalent    experience).        Proven experience in video production, including project management, from    concept to final delivery.        Strong understanding of video production techniques, visual storytelling, and    post-production processes.        Proficiency with video editing software and production equipment.        Exceptional project management skills, including budgeting and scheduling.        Excellent communication and collaboration skills.        Attention to detail and a creative eye for visual storytelling.        Strong problem-solving abilities and the ability to adapt to changing project    needs.          Preferred Qualifications:          Experience with motion graphics and animation.        Familiarity with color correction and color grading techniques.        Knowledge of 360-degree and VR video production.        Experience with live streaming and event video production.        Graphic design skills and experience with graphics software (e.g., Adobe    Photoshop).          Benefits:          Competitive compensation package        Opportunities for professional growth and development        Creative and collaborative work environment
column11: Graphics, Post production, Visual Effects, Concept development, Project management, Consulting, Animation, Video editing, Scheduling, Photoshop

column2: JOB   DESCRIPTION Designation:  Creative Producer Location   :  Bangalore  Position:  Full Time ABOUT   DONATEKART Are you someone who cares deeply about making a real difference? Then Donatekart is the right place for you! We are Indias most trusted and transparent crowdfunding platform where people from across the globe can donate towards raising funds for products required by NGOs in India, which are then delivered to them by us. In the last 6+ years, we were able to create 5000+ campaigns, raise over 200 Cr+ worth of Donations to support over 1400+ charities. Over 7,00,000+ unique donors used our platform to channelize donations to charities of their choice. Donatekart has won many notable awards like Indias Best Social Enterprise Award and NASSCOM Social Innovation Award among others and has also been invited by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation to the US and China. We have a collaborative, inclusive and supportive culture where people are given the space and freedom to voice their thoughts. We are a young and energetic team with the vision to create a lasting social impact. Responsibilities  To be solely responsible for producing a campaign appeal video from scripting to end video  End-to-end operational management for shoots  Work closely with editors to produce quality content  Work closely with the Business Development team to understand timelines, video  deliveries, and special occasions  Work with the production team to ideate new campaign ideas and video content  Adhere to strict timelines and meet deadlines strategically  Script videos by working closely with the Business Development team and Production  team  Script videos for social media, corporate and partnerships teams, and implement new treatments for videos  Talk to the NGOs to understand their story and to be able to translate it to a quality video  Plan for content to launch a variety of videos for different causes to maintain diversity  Work directly with the film production team to develop video content  Work with the marketing team to analyze videos and improve them for better donations  Researching what kind of relevant content is performing well on YouTube and other  platforms to strategize on the content requirement.  Good team management skills.   Flexible  Work and manage multiple videos strategically  Work with filmmakers, videographers, voice-over artists, and DOPs closely to schedule shoots, retrieve footage, and photographs  Maintain good relationships with filmmakers   Requirements  2-3 years of professional experience in video production and working with editors  Preferred Languages: English, Hindi, and Telugu  Any certificate course on editing, scriptwriting, and video production can be an added advantage  Must have exceptional team management skills.  Must have excellent attention to detail.  Must be able to maintain a positive attitude while working closely with different teams.  Must be able to understand the basics of filmmaking and video content creation
column11: Team Management, Video Production, Film Production, Script Writing, Video Editing, Cross Functional Coordination, Post Production, Pre-production

column2: Skills:      Mandatory Skills:          Plan video shoots; scout,  select and reserve shoot locations.       Select and hire additional crew and talent; direct and coach talent; make transportation arrangements for crew,  talent and equipment; and ensure all location power needs are met.           Desired Skills          Record and edit video and sound projects,  including selecting program format for final output,  capturing/importing media,  organizing raw media,  editing footage and sound files,  creating and inserting static and motion graphics,  titling,  adding music/voice-over/sfx,  media management and archiving project media.       Manage video library.            What you ll be responsible for:          Create and develop multimedia (audio/video) content for customer stories,  internal company announcement videos,  external promotional social videos,  product marketing videos,  recruiting videos,  corporate training and other enterprise-wide projects.       Script,  storyboard,  budget,  allocate resources,  set deadlines and select optimal forms of media for projects.       Collaborate closely with internal clients,  external clients,  models and stakeholders to help facilitate the creation of multimedia content.       Work independently,  as well as part of a team,  to establish project deliverables.            Challenges (also responsible) you ll be facing in the role:          Should be flexible to work at any time during production escalation or during critical deliveries.       Prompt action is required for all the jobs.       Expected to have flawless delivery.       Should be ready to attend client calls and understand the requirement/instruction clearly.       Should be capable to transfer knowledge to others.               Job Location:   Chennai        Job Title:   Executive   Video Producer        Job Type:   Full Time        Years of Experience:   2 - 4 Years

column2: Conceptualization and Scripting:    Analyze communication objectives of creative projects and translate them into strong concepts and scripts. Craft engaging and persuasive scripts that convey the desired message        Brand Understanding:    Develop a clear understanding of the brands values, mission, and goals. Stay updated on new media initiatives and incorporate them into promo concepts        Promo Shoot Management:    Direct and oversee promo shoots, ensuring the vision is executed effectively. Collaborate with production teams, talent, and crew to achieve high-quality visuals        Editing and Graphics:    Knowledge basic video editing and graphics tasks to enhance the visual appeal of promos. Should use motion graphics in the promo outputs. Ensure the final output meets quality standards and aligns with the brands aesthetic        Cross-Functional Coordination   : Coordinate with telecast, programming, and scheduling teams for the seamless dispatch and telecast of promos. Collaborate with various departments to ensure a cohesive approach to on-air branding        Adaptability:    Willingness to take on additional responsibilities beyond the scope of the role as needed. Flexibility to embrace new challenges and contribute to the teams success            Who should apply for this role           Experience:    A track record of 2+ years in producing promos for TV, Digital shows, and Movies. Strong grasp of film craft and a keen enthusiasm for learning more        Professional Background:    Previous experience within agencies, production houses, or broadcast is preferred        Innovator:    An innovative thinker with a proactive problem-solving attitude, who demonstrates a good sense of aesthetics and proficiency in visual treatment

column1: Urgently Hiring | Multimedia Producer @ Shiksha.com | Noida
column2: Location:  B-8 Office, Sector-132, Noida. Near Jaypee Wishtown// C-10 Office Sector-2 Noida Working Days:  5 Days (Mon-Fri), Weekend fixed off Work Model:  Work from Office Work Timings:  09:30am- 06:30pm Job Description: This person will be a part of the core strategy and execution team for social media video content for Info Edge. The person would need to bring a lot of creativity, originality and energy to the table supplemented with a high degree of curiosity and superlative research skills. Thorough understanding and knowledge of video production is a must. This person should have an eye for detail and must understand what works for social media and what doesnt. This is what his/her daily tasks and responsibilities would involve: 1. Participating on brain storming sessions on what social appropriate video content to create next for the different business brands. 2. Executing the above basis an agreed upon time line, reach out to experts and SMEs and line up interviews and shoots, engage with them to get the right video inputs 3. Refine and implement scheduling and content uploading processes to maximize growth of our channels, their reach and their impact. 4. Be involved in end to end production including voice overs, scripting, anchoring and production of video 5. Setting the annual/ monthly schedules for videos across all of our channels 6. Communicating with the Adaptation, Production and Post Production teams to know what content is ready to share on YouTube 7. Upload promo videos on different channels to create a buzz for the content produced, coordinate with the marketing teams of the respective brands for this 8. Creating video metadata (titles, tags, thumbnails) and playlists 9. Uploading video metadata and publishing videos to YouTube 10. Coordinate with the relevant stakeholders and work cross functionally with the business and production teams to share performance on work done earlier as well as next steps (inform, review, plough back learnings) 11. Post content across platforms (linked in, instagram, youtube, twitter) with the right messaging and tagging to ensure maximization of reach. 12. Analyse what is working and what is not through youtube analytics, identify trends, experiment and be ready to relearn to deliver targets of audience growth and engagement, share learnings with the rest of the digital team. Technical skills Responsible for voice-overs, scripting, anchoring and production of videos. Knowledge of video equipment, shoot planning, interviewing experts, conducting panel discussions Expert in Bilingual- Hindi and English Developing the processes that we have in place for scheduling the upload of content Knowledge of streaming webinars on multiple platforms This role will provide ample opportunity to display initiative and drive. It also offers high potential for growth, learning and creating impact.
column11: Adobe Premiere Pro, Anchoring, Video Production, Video Editing, Multimedia Producer, Post Production, Voice Overs, Production, Script Writing, Pre-production
